title: Lugthart
content:
Hello,   
   
I was wondering if you could give me some feedback on this font. It reaaaally needs some fresh eyes, cause I've stared at the thing too many hours today..   
Im a little worried about the Y and the T, the 7 also annoys the  out of me.   
   
let me know what you think.
author: 19hrs

comments.content: This is cool. I have to look at it some more but maybe you can mieter the corners of the 'T' Give it a try. And for the 'y' maybe you can lower the point where the two lines meet(I hope i'm explaining it right).

Also the letter 't' seems a little narrow, maybe you make the arms longer.   
   
IM
